Translations.Text: Tamen yuanyi he funumen zai yiqi, tamen de xin yi fengbile, gu tamen bushi mingli de.
Dan shizhe he ta de xinshimen, jie ziji de caichan he shengming er fendou; zhe deng ren zheng shi youfu de, zhe deng ren zheng shi chenggong de.
Zhenzhu yi wei tamen yubeile xia lin zhu he de leyuan, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong, na zheng shi weida de chenggong.
Youmu ren zhong youren tuo gu laixiang ni qingjia, tamen dui zhenzhu ji qi shizhe sahuang bu ken lai qingjia, tamen zhong buxindao zhe, jiang zaoshou tongku de xingfa.
Shuairuo zhe, haibing zhe, wu lufei zhe,(tamen bu chuzheng) dou wuzuiguo, ruguo tamen zhongyu zhenzhu ji qi shizhe. Xingshan de renmen shi wu ke feinan de; zhenzhu shi zhi she de, zhi ci de.

Na deng ren yeshi wu ke feinan de, dang tamen lai qingqiu ni yi shengkou gong gei tamen (chuzheng) de shihou, ni shuo:`Wo meiyou shengkou gong gei nimen.'Tamen jiu hui lei er qu, tamen yin wei buneng zi chou lufei er beishang.
Jia zi fuzu, er xiang ni qingjia de renmen, cai shi gai shou feinan de; tamen yuan yu funumen zai yiqi, zhenzhu fengbile tamen de xin, gu tamen bu zhidao.
